p.d: Dustbins, soap or paper: what do we really know about them? In each episode, the Cochon Dingue team examine a theme from every angle, including its history, the way it's made and its secrets. Directed by: Sébastien Hurtubise (Canada, 2016) Presented by: Pascal Barriault, Valérie Chevalier, Marilou Morin, Pascal Morrissette
